h2_title: Black Loong Boss Fight and Guide
content: One method to evade reliably is to listen to the drum beats to anticipate the spacing of the rings, and then dodge parallel to Black Loong, moving from side to side as you evade, instead of toward the next ring or backward into a previous one. It will take a bit of practice, so having electric resistance augmented can help when you slip up.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Black_Loong.md', within the main section titled 'Black Loong', specifically from the subsection 'Black Loong Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
One method to evade reliably is to listen to the drum beats to anticipate the spacing of the rings, and then dodge parallel to Black Loong, moving from side to side as you evade, instead of toward the next ring or backward into a previous one. It will take a bit of practice, so having electric resistance augmented can help when you slip up.
